verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a wind a-blowing, all across the land
A fragrant breeze from Heaven
Blowing once again.
Don't know where it comes from,
Don't know where it goes,
But let it blow over me
Oh, sweet wind, come and blow over me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's a rain a-pouring, showers from above
Mercy drops are coming
Mercy drops of love.
Turn your face to heaven,
Let the water pou,r
Well, let it pour over me
Oh, sweet rain, come and pour over me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There's a fire a-burning, falling from the sky;
Awesome tongues of fire,
Consuming you and I.
Can you feel it burning
Burn the sacrifice?
Well, let it burn over me
Oh, sweet fire, come and burn over me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Oh lift your voice
Call for the wind, call for the rain, call for the fire
We say we're keen Lord...
Come and pour, oh Lord.
Do it again and again and again and again and again, oh Lord
Oh, sweet fire, come and burn over me
Oh, sweet rain, come and pour over me
Oh, sweet wind, come and blow over me

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Let it blow over, let it blow over, let it blow over...
